TopicTitle: Not playing KSP until bug fix....

Articles.Content:
Hello dear users,

I just want to say,don't try contacting me in the next month or so, because I am taking a break from KSP, probably until the next update.

Why?

I played KSP just fine and was happy, until 0.23

Yes yes, tweakables, RAPIER etc.

I loved the tweakables, but I didn't like the side animation bug on the RAPIER and that it didn't automatically translation modes for me..

Also 0.23 added a ton of new bugs, and I don't have the time to name them all, some were already spotted.

I can't build planes properly anymore because of 0.23

Just one question to SQUAD: why? Why did you give us such an unfinished update with so few new things?

I am not playing KSP until you fix the bugs, thank you..

I can't build planes properly anymore because of 0.23

Is it something to do with part clipping?
I hope you enjoy your break, sometimes its the little things that get us, and a bit of time off can be good.
